import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import Header from './Header' // Syntax Sugar import Content from './Content' import Content2 from './Content2' import Counter from './Counter' import Buttons from './Buttons' import Modal from './Modal' import Footer from './Footer' import Albuns from './Albuns' import Card from './Card' import Cards from './Cards' import image1 from './IMG/image1.jpg' import image2 from './IMG/image2.png' import image3 from './IMG/image3.jpg' function App() { const [ page, setPage ] = useState() const onChangePage = page => { setPage(page) } return( <>

{page}
) } export default App
